definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
both the guests and the hosts thoroughly enjoy themselves (idiom)

sentences.english: It was found that the decrease of absorbance of guest-host cell is almost proportional to the exposure time and light intensity.
sentences.chinese: 發現賓主盒吸光度的減少幾乎正比於暴光時間和強度。

sentences.english: The two sides held warm and friendly talks.
sentences.chinese: 賓主進行了親切友好的交談。

sentences.english: During the talks, each side briefed the other on its own domestic situation.
sentences.chinese: 會談中，賓主雙方介紹了各自國內情況。

sentences.english: In a moment they were all out of the chaise, rejoicing at the sight of each other.
sentences.chinese: 一剎眼工夫，他們都下了車，賓主相見，無限歡欣。

sentences.english: Everybody knows it from either end.
sentences.chinese: 每個人無論賓主都瞭解。

sentences.english: Both sides are confident and looking forward to cooperation in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 賓主雙方對今後的合作充滿信心。

sentences.english: The two sides held talks on friendly terms.
sentences.chinese: 賓主進行了友好的談話。

sentences.english: Both sides held friendly talks with each other.
sentences.chinese: 賓主進行了友好的談話。

sentences.english: The loo conversation was a turning point in our landlord-tenant relationship.
sentences.chinese: 這次關於馬桶的對話，是我們賓主關係的轉折點。

sentences.english: The two sides briefed each other on their respective domestic political situations and economic development.
sentences.chinese: 賓主相互介紹了各自國內的政治形勢和經濟發展情況。

sentences.english: The two sides held cordial and friendly talks.
sentences.chinese: 賓主進行了親切友好的談話。

sentences.english: The two sides held friendly talks.
sentences.chinese: 賓主進行了友好的談話。

sentences.english: The two sides held a friendly conversation.
sentences.chinese: 賓主進行了友好的談話。

sentences.english: At last the host and the guest hoist their goblets together saying something lucky.
sentences.chinese: 最後，賓主雙方舉杯祝願合作愉快。

sentences.english: The two sides exchanged views on China-Africa relations and on the issues of development and anti-terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 賓主就中非關係以及發展和反恐問題交換了看法。

sentences.english: Host and guests frequently raised their glasses during the feast.

definition: to gather happily under one roof
variant of 嘉賓|嘉宾[jia1 bin1]
to write or draw with a brush/to put pen to paper/to write
member of a board of directors
to take tea and chat/a small-scale informal gathering with tea and snacks
